card.name: Fury of the Iron Crown
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of the Iron Crown. Playable on a non-detainment orc, troll, man, or Nazgûl attack. The attack receives +4 prowess. After the attack is faced, it is automatically defeated, and The Iron Crown may be placed from the defender’s hand with any member of the defending company.

card.name: Neeker-breekers
card.text: Detainment. Each non-avatar character is assigned a strike. Special: Instead of prowess, a character’s mind is used as the base prowess when facing the strike.

card.name: Black Arrow
card.text: Action: If borne by a warrior, tap this item to give -1 prowess and -1 body to an attack the bearer is facing. Trigger: If the bearer is not a Man, discard this item when it is tapped.

card.name: Ireful Flames
card.text: Items are not playable at The Lonely Mountain, Irerock, Gold Hill, and/or Zarak Dûm. Action: A player may reveal and discard from his hand an item that would normally be playable at one of the aforementioned sites to cancel the effects of this card until the end of the turn.

card.name: Fatty Bolger
card.text: Unique. If played during the organization phase, may only be brought into play at Bag End. +1 to corruption checks. Action: You may tap Fatty Bolger when a Hobbit in his company is facing a strike to cancel it. -1 Corruption.

card.name: The Arkenstone
card.text: Unique. Playable at the Lonely Mountain. Bearer receives +5 EI against Dwarves and +5 to influence checks against Dwarf factions. The mind of all Dwarves increases by one.

card.name: Deadly Dart
card.text: Action: If bearer is a Scout, tap this item to give -1 strike to a minimum of one and -1 body to an attack.

card.name: The Iron Crown
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Action: You may tap this item when the bearer is facing an orc, troll, or man attack to cancel it. Action Trigger: The bearer makes a corruption check every time he makes an influence check.
